definition: a Chinese foot/one-third of a meter/a ruler/a tape-measure/one of the three acupoints for measuring pulse in Chinese medicine/CL:支[zhi1],把[ba3]
one of the characters used to represent a musical note in gongche notation, 工尺譜|工尺谱[gong1 che3 pu3]
to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences

sentences.english: Methods The four wave interaction model equations for small scale disturbances were analyzed numerically.
sentences.chinese: 方法對小尺度運動四波相互作用模型進行數值分析。

sentences.english: And don't ask me, well what about the relative dimension of this?
sentences.chinese: 不要問我，這個的相對尺度是怎樣的？

sentences.english: Scale is a platitude problem of geomorphology.
sentences.chinese: 尺度是一個老生常談的地學問題。

sentences.english: Power law probability distributions of multiscale auroral dynamics from ground - based TV observations.
sentences.chinese: 根據陸基TV觀測多尺度極光動力學的冪律概率分佈。

sentences.english: The amount of coal and iron a country has proves a measure of its industry.
sentences.chinese: 一個國家的煤鐵產量可作爲衡量它工業的尺度。

sentences.english: The development of microscale laser shock processing was presented.
sentences.chinese: 展望了微尺度激光衝擊處理技術的發展及應用前景。

sentences.english: Multi-scale edge detection based on over-sampled filter banks is studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究基於過採樣濾波器組的多尺度邊緣檢測算法。

sentences.english: Perfect scale, define your official elegance.
sentences.chinese: 完美尺度，定義貴仕優雅格調。

sentences.english: This factor is genetic, much like a weight setpoint.
sentences.chinese: 這個因素涉及到遺傳問題，就像重量尺度一樣。

sentences.english: The manifestations of the law at different scales exhibit approximate self-similarity. Newton called it 'Nature conformable to Herself.
sentences.chinese: 這些規律的在不同的尺度上顯示出自相似性。

sentences.english: Science is the important measurement of evaluating architecture creation.
sentences.chinese: 科學是評價建築創作的重要尺度。

sentences.english: Canopy overhangs scale here too, can reduce?
sentences.chinese: 此處雨篷出挑尺度太大，能否減小？

sentences.english: Measure, where quality and quantity are in one, is thus the completion of Being.
sentences.chinese: 作爲質與量的統一，尺度因而是完成了的存在。

sentences.english: It is a uniform scale of measurement of earthquake size. It is suitable for statistics covering a broad range of magnitudes.
sentences.chinese: 它是一個均勻的震級標度，適用於寬尺度的地震統計。

sentences.english: And the paper introduces the particular process of multi-scale contrast modulation.
sentences.chinese: 同時着重說明了多尺度對比度調製法的具體過程。

sentences.english: The influence of flume tank parameters on ship rolling are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 槽型減搖水艙尺度的變化對船橫搖運動有一定的影響。

definition: space/room/(fig.) scope/leeway/(astronomy) outer space/(physics, math.) space
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
(number of) degrees of freedom (physics and statistics)
